instructions.title: How to use Excel Filter Tool

steps.title: Upload your Excel file
steps.description: Drag and drop your .xlsx or .xls file (up to 50MB) or click to browse. The tool will instantly load and display your data in a table format.

steps.title: Apply filters to columns
steps.description: Click 'Add Filter' to create column-specific filters. Choose from text, numeric, and date operators like contains, equals, greater than, or between values.

steps.title: Search and sort data
steps.description: Use the global search to find data across all columns instantly. Click column headers to sort data in ascending or descending order.

steps.title: Export filtered results
steps.description: Export your filtered and sorted data as CSV or Excel format. Hidden columns will be excluded from the export.

troubleshooting: File won't upload: Ensure file is .xlsx or .xls format and under 50MB
No data showing: Check if Excel file has data in first sheet
Filter not working: Verify the filter value matches data type (text/number)
Slow performance: Try filtering data to reduce visible rows
Export missing columns: Check if columns are hidden in column manager
